message.body: I do!!!
Yesssssssssss :) :) :) :)
I don't know of plans yet. Are you coming tonight or tomorrow?
Well, it depends on what I can get my parents to do - is there something going on tonight?
There is but I won't be there because I didn't get on the flight. Again. :(
Whatttt? Are you flying stand by?
Yes. Never again.
Oh, I know. I fly stand by all the time and you have to be verrrrrrrrry flexible. Almost not worth it. But I can't get there until tomorrow anyway. When's the next flight?
I always flew standby in college and I always got on the flight I wanted... This is the first. Two flights tomorrow in the morning and afternoon
Well keep me updated, my love :)
I'm coming in at 2 tomorrow, for SURE.
I hope you have a copy of rilke's letters to a young poet.

There's a copy somewhere, but I live Rilke for many reasons that are definitely not limited to the fact that Lauren Hill reads it in Sister Act II: Back in the Habit. Who's picking you up this afternoon?!?
Travvy. I only read what sister mary clarence gives me.
Her warm-ups have absolutely transformed my voice. Well awesomeeeee I'll text you when I get to the cities then!!! It'll be close to 2 :) :) :)
Actually, my therapist gave it to me... :) and yay!!!!

Also, meg said there's a cool puppet theatre thing tonight. remember that parade where our twins were standing across the street? It's that same company. Anyway, if you want we could go to that and see brave as a matinee with Meggie!
Yes please!
Yayyyyyyyy
I wonder what they look like now...
Look in the mirror, silly
Do you think trav or Jason wants to go to the puppets?
I will ask. Tim is having some kind of shindig to kick off pride but that starts at 2...
Ohhhhh ok. Could I go to that?
I didn't know everyone was so into pride
Only mos. Obviously.
Mos?
Of course you can. Tim specifically said to bring cool people, he meant you.
Ho-mos
Hah, im the only cool person. I'll text you later for the address, mo.
Should I reserve us two tickets though!
Yes for me! Travis is going to see dan savage, which is sold out. Don't know about Jason
Dan savage!!!
Well puppets are cool too.
Yeah I don't know why he didn't tell me about it...
Bummer :( wellllll, I have two tickets for us - it's general admission so if Jason comes he'll be good to sit by us anyway
I'm excited for it. How much?
$5 - don't worry it's on me..... Bahahahaha
Aw I'll buy you a mango on a stick or something
Mango on a stick are the official food of mpls pride
Not chocolate covered frozen bananas?
That's the unofficial food
Are you/do you want to be going to Kelly Rowland Tomorrow night?
Kelly Rowland, as in beyonce's leftovers?
But at least bee is gourmet
It's true... But I don't think i want to go to that unless it's free... Hah
She is the headliner for pride concert, tickets are only 15...
Where?
Hmm no idea
Yea, I'm not so sure about seeing 1/3 of destiny's child... Maybe if a lot of people go
Always waiting for the coolest thing are we
I know all the gays are going
20somethings
I can't wait to see you :)
Same! <3
Jason can come to Angela gulner tonight! How does he get a ticket?
Bahahahahahahahahahahahahaha I was tre confused for a second. I'll text him the info :)
Are you here??
Not yet we are deciding transportation
Well hurry! Cause I am!! :/
And Jason soon!
We are on the bus...
Come outside!
